Part 2: Construct a prism with a curved side. Create a new coordinate system with euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and a translation vector of 0.0, 0.0, 0.3. 1. Create a new sketch on the XY plane. 2. Part 3: Construct a cylinder. Create a new coordinate system with euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and a translation vector of 0.225, 0.275, 0.3. 1. Create a new sketch on the XY plane. 2. Draw a circle with center point (0.1, 0.1) and a radius of 0.1. Extrude the sketch with the following properties: - Extrusion depth towards normal: 0.0. - Extrusion depth opposite normal: 1.25. - Sketch scale: 0.2. - Operation: Cut existing material. You would need to extract this data for accurate dimensions.)</description>
